* Julian Reschke <julian.reschke@...> [2007-07-07 09:40]:
> Please stop the WebDAV bashing. WebDAV does indeed use new
> methods where new resources may have worked as well, but that's
> a completely separate argument :-)

There are number of bogus claims against WebDAV that I am happy
to correct, but I happen to think its bias to introduce methods
over resources is incontrovertible (and has obvious parallels
to the discussion at hand). Therefore sorry, but not gonna. :-)

Regards,
